name: Grüel - Fallen City
description:
Grüel - Fallen City is a open world story-based adventure game that lets you play as The Keeper, a mysterious figure wandering a city long lost to three plagues. Solve the puzzles of the plagues and explore the streets and outskirts of the lost city.

An XInput controller is highly recommended for a more immersive experience, but the game also supports mouse and keyboard.

Created during Create Jam Fall 2020.

Recommended system requirements:

Any relatively modern quad-core CPU
2GB free system RAM
Dedicated graphics with at least 2GB high-bandwidth VRAM (Nvidia GT 1030 GDDR5 or Nvidia GT 740 GDDR5 or better should work fine)
